thread.title: The Global Travel Conspiracy, Episode 10 – Africa, Africa and More Africa
thread.title_full: The Global Travel Conspiracy, Episode 10 – Africa, Africa and More Africa

author: Gary
title: The Global Travel Conspiracy, Episode 10 – Africa, Africa and More Africa
text:
Posted: September 11, 2015 Categories: Podcast , The Global Travel Conspiracy 25 Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Google Pinterest Stumbleupon 
This week’s guest is Francis Tapon who has been traveling around Africa for the past two years. We talk about travel in Africa, and we talk about the specific thoughts and experiences he has from each of the countries he has visited.
